vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.9.1;
son of: Aphiah (H0647);
father of: Zeror (H6872C)
§ Bechorath = "first-born"
a Benjamite ancestor of Saul
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Afíah; ancestro del rey Saúl; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比歌拉 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "頭生的"
一位便雅憫人, 掃羅的祖先 (撒上 9:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
比歌拉 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "头生的"
一位便雅悯人, 扫罗的祖先 (撒上 9:1)
